highlights.description: Go wrapper for FFmpeg and FFprobe with type-safe command building, media probing, and hardware encoder detection

added.description: Type-safe command builder with fluent API for constructing FFmpeg commands
`Probe()` function returning detailed media info (duration, resolution, codecs, streams)
Cross-platform support for VideoToolbox (macOS), NVENC (NVIDIA), QuickSync (Intel), AMF (AMD), VA-API (Linux)
`ListEncoders()` function to enumerate all available video encoders

documentation.description: README with comprehensive API reference and usage examples

tests.description: Unit tests for command builder, encoder detection, and probe functions
